--CREATE OR ALTER VIEW report_account AS
SELECT
[accountid]
,[parentaccountid]
,[primarycontactid]
,[ts_currentauditor]
,[ts_headofficeid]
,[ts_originationlead1]
,[ts_originationlead2]
,[ts_recommendedby]
,[ts_validatedby]



 FROM [dataverse_montagu_org5a2bcccf].[dbo].[account]

WHERE statecode = 0
